titles: Controversial discourses relating to the church being an answer to Dr. Sherlock's Discourse concerning the nature, unitie, and communion of the Catholick Chvrch / by B.D.
author: B. D.
Rochester, John Wilmot, Earl of, 1647-1680.
notes: Attributed by Wing to John Wilmot, Earl of Rochester.
Reproduction of original in the Union Theological Seminary Library.
keywords: Sherlock, William, 1641?-1707. --  Discourse concerning the nature, unity, and communion of the Catholick Church.
